Find Your Program

Our programs provide a foundation for a rigorous academic experience through high quality undergraduate, graduate, and professional programs both on campus and at a distance.

A Place to Succeed

Kenda Sancet

Kendra Sancet has been named the Lone Star Conference Softball Academic Player of the Year for her excellence on the field and in the classroom. Sancet, a mathematics major with a 3.939 GPA, started all 48 games this season for TWU and leads the LSC in doubles with 20.

Kenda Sancet

Education is an Experience

With three locations in Denton, Dallas, and Houston students experience the benefits of our tight-knit community and hands-on professors, as well as access to some of the largest health science centers in the country. Through a variety of academic programs and internship opportunities, we seek to lead our students to a fulfilling life of leadership and service.

Denton

More than 12,000 students study at TWU’s Denton campus, which offers programs in the liberal arts, the sciences, business, and education.

Dallas

The TWU T. Boone Pickens Institute of Health Sciences in Dallas offers programs in nursing, occupational therapy, physical therapy, health systems management, and an EMBA.

Houston

The TWU Institute of Health Sciences in Houston offers programs in health care administration, nursing, nutrition and food sciences, occupational therapy, physical therapy, and an EMBA.
